operation.name: Read
operation.description: This operation allows read access to index values and documents.

operation.name: Write
operation.description: This operation grants the user write access to index values, documents for inserting data.

operation.name: addJumpMark
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to set a jump mark for quick navigation through various documents in the viewer..

operation.name: addObject
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for adding documents or pages to existing content in the HitList.

operation.name: AddTextComments
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for adding comments to document(s) in the viewer window pane.

operation.name: AddTwain
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to add a document via a scanner and to also import it as object.

operation.name: changeindexfromviewer
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to change the hierarchy node in the viewer; if denied then the windows client disables the move content button in the viewer panel's menu bar

operation.name: checkout
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to the functions of checkin and checkout of documents or pages.

operation.name: clonecontent
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to create a content with a dummy.tif only. This was a special feature for a customer.

operation.name: CopyAndInsertIndexValues
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to copy index values by clicking with the right mouse button and insert index values by selecting a new content and pasting the copied values.

operation.name: copycontent
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for copying and pasting of documents to another node.

operation.name: createpdffromviewer
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to create a PDF with all the selected objects in the viewer.

operation.name: DeactivateContent
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to deactivate documents and index data.

operation.name: ReactivateContent
operation.description: This operation allows the reactivating of the deactivated document(s) and index data.

operation.name: deactivateobject
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to deactivate single objects attached to a content.

operation.name: DeleteAnnotation
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to delete annotations in the viewer.

operation.name: denychangeindex
operation.description: This operation denies the right of the user for moving content to another node.

operation.name: denyDropToHierarchy
operation.description: This operation denies the right of the user to drag and drop content and files to a hierarchy node or to a structured search result node.

operation.name: denyEditIndexValues
operation.description: This operation denies the right of the user to edit index values only. However, multiindexing and moving content is still allowed.

operation.name: denyFileImport
operation.description: This operation denies the right of the user to attach objects to a specific node.

operation.name: denyHitlistAddContent
operation.description: This operation denies the right of the user to perform Hitlist, AddContent and AddContentHere actions.

operation.name: denyImport
operation.description: This operation denies the right of the user to add content to a specific node. This only effects manual import. Importing with Content Automation is still valid.

operation.name: disableediting
operation.description: This operation denies the right of the user to change any index values.

operation.name: dragfilefromhitlist
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to drag files from the HitList to another location. To drag files press 'CTRL+SHIFT'.

operation.name: dragfilefromviewer
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to drag files from viewer to another location. To drag files press 'CTRL+SHIFT'.

operation.name: dragobjectfromhitlist
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to drag and drop objects from the search result on a result with operation 'write' and 'addObject'.

operation.name: dragobjectfromviewer
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to drag and drop objects from the viewer on the HitList with operation 'write' and 'addObject'.

operation.name: dragmerge
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to drag objects for merging contents in hitlist.

operation.name: dropmerge
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to drop objects for merging contents in HitList.

operation.name: EditAnnotation
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for editing annotations in the Viewer.

operation.name: eventDocumentViewed
operation.description: This operation enables the CSP client to send a 'documentViewed' event to the server.

operation.name: ExportWithAnno
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to export HitLists with annotations.

operation.name: ExportWithoutAnno
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to export HitLists without annotations.

operation.name: hideVisibleNodes
operation.description: This operation hides visible nodes from the client (set the 'isVisible' parameter to no); note that this takes precedence over 'showInvisibleNodes'.

operation.name: hitlistchange
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for changing hierarchy node with hitlist.

operation.name: hitlistmerge
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to merge content in the HitList.

operation.name: hitlistmulti
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to create multiindex with the HitList.

operation.name: ignoreLocalCache
operation.description: This operation ignores the local client cache for this content types.

operation.name: importWithoutFiles
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for importing without any dialog message that there are no files attached.

operation.name: launch
operation.description: This operation opens the selected object with the operating system's default application.

operation.name: mailFromViewer
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for mailing documents in Viewer.

operation.name: ManageStamps
operation.description: This operation allows the management of stamps.

operation.name: multiDocumentViewing
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to view same document in multiple viewers.

operation.name: multiIndex
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for multiindexing.

operation.name: multiindexingallowed
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for multiinedxing in the Client GUI.

operation.name: multiindexingview
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to view multiindexes only - disables creating multiindexes.

operation.name: newindexfromviewer
operation.description: This operation creates a new index set from the viewer.

operation.name: PolyCut
operation.description: This operation allows the function polyCut in viewer.

operation.name: Print
operation.description: This operation allows the printing of documents.

operation.name: PrintTextComments
operation.description: This operation allows the printing of comments to documents in viewer.

operation.name: reactivateObject
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to reactivate objects that have been deactivated.

operation.name: ReadIndexValue
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for read access to index values only, documents cannot be viewed.

operation.name: ReadTextComments
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to view the comments you have added previously to the document.

operation.name: removeJumpMark
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to remove a jump mark.

operation.name: Save
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to save all the changes of the objects.

operation.name: savelocalfromviewer
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for saving of documents or pages to local file system out of Viewer.

operation.name: searchcontentid
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to search via ContentID.

operation.name: searchdeactivated
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to search deactivated objects.

operation.name: showCheckInComment
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for adding 'Comments' in the 'CheckIn' viewer dialog.

operation.name: ShowHideAnnotation
operation.description: This operation allows the displaying and hiding of annotations; Button is in the Viewer 'Show/Hide Note'.

operation.name: showDeactivatedObjects
operation.description: This operation displays for the user all objects that have been deactivated.

operation.name: showInHint
operation.description: This operation will show content info in a Hitlist Hint.

operation.name: showVisibleNodes
operation.description: An operation that is always granted and allows to see nodes

operation.name: showInvisibleNodes
operation.description: This operation denies the right to hide content hierarchy from user.

operation.name: SplitContent
operation.description: This operation allows the splitting/duplicating of documents.

operation.name: usePrefetching
operation.description: This operation allows the content to be prefetched in the HitList.

operation.name: useStamps
operation.description: This operation allows the usage of stamps. Button is in the Viewer 'Show Stamp Manager'.

operation.name: viewerLinkedDoc
operation.description: This operation shows all linked documents.

operation.name: viewJumpMarks
operation.description: This operation will display jump marks.

operation.name: viewrepresentation
operation.description: This operation allows the creation of document representations.

operation.name: personalFolderAdd
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to creating personal folder entries.

operation.name: personalFolderDelete
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for deleting personal folder entries (should just be added to Personal Folder node).

operation.name: ShowHeadData
operation.description: This operation is the default 'Branch To' Operation for the Node 'Invoices': 'Show Head Data'

operation.name: ShowPositionData
operation.description: This operation is a default 'Branch To' operation for the 'Invoices' node: Show Position Data

operation.name: ShowHistory
operation.description: This operation in 'Branch To' is an option to collect the working history of any content and deposit it to the Audit Trail.

operation.name: ShowReferencingObjects
operation.description: This operation allows a 'Branch To' search from Objects; it takes the MD5 and searches for the same MD5 in the 'Objects' Node.

operation.name: ShowObjects
operation.description: This operation allows a 'Branch To' search from any content to all of its objects.

operation.name: ShowOriginalContent
operation.description: This operation allows a 'Branch To' search from Objects; this takes the ContentID of an Object and searches for ContentID.

operation.name: ContentRecorderBranchToObjects
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to the 'Branch To Search' function for Content Recorder to see referenced objects.

operation.name: ShowContent
operation.description: This operation causes the client to display the 'ShowContent' saved search in the Content Recorder Node.

operation.name: ShowIOQueueOperations
operation.description: This operation enables management of single IOQueues.

operation.name: ShowIOQueues
operation.description: This operation enables management operations on a set of IOQueues.

operation.name: PersonalFolderBranchToObjects
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights to see original objects from the sub-node 'Personal Folder'.

operation.name: PersonalFolderShowContent
operation.description: This operation grants the user the rights for 'Branch To' from Personal Folder node to its original content; searches for a Content ID.

operation.name: ShowRepresentations
operation.description: This operation allows 'Branch To' to the Representaion search of selected content.

operation.name: showCheckStatus
operation.description: This operation allows a Branch To search from Monitoring Hosts to related Check status.

operation.name: showCheckHistory
operation.description: This operation will display content history in the 'Content Recorder' Node via the 'Branch To' action.

operation.name: showNotification
operation.description: This operation allows a 'Branch To' search in 'Notifications' node.

operation.name: useReportViewer
operation.description: Forces the Web-Client to use the ReportViewer (mainly used for HTML) instead of the WebReader

operation.name: annotation.create
operation.description: This CSP Web Client operation grants the user the rights to create new annotations in the WebReader.

operation.name: annotation.delete
operation.description: This CSP Web Client operation grants the user the rights to delete existing annotations in the WebReader.

operation.name: annotation.changeText
operation.description: This CSP Web Client operation grants the user the rights to change the text of annotations in the WebReader.

operation.name: annotation.size
operation.description: This CSP Web Client operation grants the user the rights to resize annotations in the WebReader.

operation.name: annotation.move
operation.description: This CSP Web Client operation grants the user the rights to move annotations in the WebReader.

operation.name: annotation.select
operation.description: This CSP Web Client operation allows the user to select annotations in the WebReader.

operation.name: annotation.changeCategories
operation.description: This CSP Web Client operation grants the user the rights to change the category of annotations in the WebReader.
